name: INCreateNoteIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for creating notes.

items.name: func resolveTitle(for: INCreateNoteIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the title of the note.

items.name: func resolveContent(for: INCreateNoteIntent, with: (INNoteContentResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the main content of the note.

items.name: func resolveGroupName(for: INCreateNoteIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intended group of the note.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INCreateNoteIntent, completion: (INCreateNoteIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can create the note.

items.name: func handle(intent: INCreateNoteIntent, completion: (INCreateNoteIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the creation of a note.
